# scroll-to-top-btn



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                                                                                       | Type     | Default     |
| ----------- | ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `bottom`    | `bottom`    | Property that defines the bottom position of the button (in px)                                   | `number` | `undefined` |
| `direction` | `direction` | Property that defines the direction of the scroll (for now only the "top" direction is available) | `string` | `'top'`     |
| `mode`      | `mode`      | Property that defines mode of the button (can be "light" or "dark")                               | `string` | `'light'`   |
| `right`     | `right`     | Property that defines the right position of the button (in px)                                    | `number` | `undefined` |
